name: little miss blue dash
description:
LMBD is a fast paced action platformer with guns, blue hair and explosions.

WARNING: this game is hard! ( and kinda short)

more lives

finish a level without dying to earn a bonus life.

can't touch this

roll on the ground or do a flip in the air to dodge bullets and grenades.

how to play (keyboard):

WASD = move and dodge.

SPACE = shoot.

R = reload.

Q = throw grenades.

ESC = quit game.

ALT + ENTER = exit fullscreen.

how to play (joystick):

LEFT STICK = move and dodge.

A = jump.

B = reload.

X = shoot.

Y = throw grenades.
